_meta.description: Round 2 CORRECTED - Adding CFG and fixing origin parameter conflict
lessons_from_r2: CRITICAL: Must use CFG (cfg_scale=2.0) with RASA/H-bond conditioning
ori_token AND infer_ori_strategy cannot be used together - pick one
CN=5 achieved without CFG - expect better with CFG
changes_from_r2: Increased designs to 16 per config for better statistics

r2b_a_cfg_buried._description: Fixed metal + burial + CFG - should improve coordination
r2b_a_cfg_buried._hypothesis: CFG will enforce burial conditioning, concentrating scaffold around metal

r2b_b_cfg_hbond._description: Fixed metal + burial + H-bond on citrate + CFG
r2b_b_cfg_hbond._hypothesis: CFG + H-bond conditioning should improve citrate binding

r2b_c_cfg_both_buried._description: Both metal AND citrate buried with CFG
r2b_c_cfg_both_buried._hypothesis: Burying both should keep them close together
